Details: Affordable housing for urban and rural poor
Benefits: Subsidized housing loans, financial assistance
Exclusions: Income above specified limits, already owning a house
Application Process: Apply online via PMAY portal, submit documents

Details: Health insurance for poor and vulnerable families
Benefits: Free treatment up to INR 5 Lakhs
Eligibility: Families below poverty line, economically weaker sections
Exclusions: Income above threshold, not in SECC 2011
Application Process: Apply at hospitals or online via PMJAY portal

Details: Loans for small/micro enterprises
Benefits: Loans up to INR 10 Lakhs for MSMEs
Exclusions: Large enterprises, businesses with high turnover
Application Process: Apply via MUDRA portal or at partnering banks

Details: Income support to farmers
Benefits: INR 6000 per year in installments
Eligibility: Small/marginal farmers with land holdings up to 2 hectares
Application Process: Apply via PM Kisan portal or Common Service Centers

Details: Affordable energy-saving LED bulbs for households
Benefits: Energy-efficient LED bulbs at reduced rates
Application Process: Buy LEDs from registered distribution centers

Details: Promote cleanliness, sanitation, and eliminating open defecation
Benefits: Funding for building toilets, sanitation awareness
Application Process: Apply via local municipal offices or online

Details: Improve healthcare access in rural and urban areas
Benefits: Free/subsidized healthcare, maternal care, vaccinations
Eligibility: All citizens, focus on rural and low-income groups
Application Process: Access through registered public healthcare centers

Details: Pension scheme for unorganized sector workers
Benefits: Guaranteed pension up to INR 5000 per month
Application Process: Register through bank/post office

Details: Financial inclusion through bank accounts for the unbanked
Benefits: Zero balance accounts, RuPay card, overdraft facility
Eligibility: All citizens, especially rural and low-income groups
Application Process: Open accounts at banks or post offices

Details: Promotes entrepreneurship among women, SC/ST communities
Benefits: Loans between INR 10 Lakh to 1 crore
Application Process: Apply through Stand Up India portal or at partner banks

Details: Financial support for elderly, widows, and disabled persons
Benefits: Pension scheme for senior citizens, widows, and disabled
Application Process: Apply through local administration offices

Details: Universal access to elementary education
Benefits: Free primary education for children aged 6-14
Application Process: Enroll in local government schools

Details: Nutritional support for school children
Benefits: Free meals to children in government and aided schools
Application Process: Meal provided in schools

Details: Crop insurance for farmers
Benefits: Coverage for crop damage due to natural calamities
Eligibility: All farmers who grow insurable crops
Application Process: Apply through insurance companies or banks

Details: Promote digital literacy and internet access
Benefits: Free/subsidized digital literacy programs, internet services
Eligibility: All citizens, focus on rural areas
Application Process: Apply via Digital India portal or local service centers

Details: Encourages manufacturing and industrial growth in India
Benefits: Incentives for manufacturers, easier FDI regulations
Application Process: Register via Make in India portal

Details: Vocational training and skill development for youth
Benefits: Free or subsidized skill training courses
Application Process: Register through Skill India portal or training centers

Details: Skill development for employment generation
Benefits: Financial support for vocational training
Exclusions: Employed individuals, people with formal education
Application Process: Apply through training centers

Details: Increase productivity in agriculture and allied sectors
Benefits: Financial grants to farmers, agricultural schemes
Application Process: Apply via state agricultural departments

Details: Improving livelihood options in rural areas
Benefits: Self-employment and entrepreneurship support
Application Process: Apply via local government units or NRLM portal

Details: Promotes education and protection of the girl child
Benefits: Awareness programs, financial support for education
Eligibility: All girl children, focus on underprivileged communities
Application Process: Participate via local government offices or online
